title: (x) Matthew Dear "Asa Breed" album cover type - ITC Quorum {Akira Yoshino}
content:
Kind Regards to my fellow Typophiles -

I’d like to ask for your collectively keen eyes to identify this typeface -  
which is being used by electronic music artist Matthew Dear - for his new album.

Please view the image and let me know what this wonderfully light display face might be .

My Thanks and Praise in advance . . .

kind regards,

Aerosyn-Lex Mestrovic
